description: Try our easy to follow Salami & Capsicum Pizzas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Salami & Capsicum Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 tsp dried basil (for quick tomato sauce)
2 tbs extra virgin olive oil (for quick tomato sauce)
0.25 tsp dried chilli flakes (for quick tomato sauce)
0.5 tsp dried oregano (for quick tomato sauce)
400g can diced tomatoes (for quick tomato sauce)
1 garlic clove, crushed, for quick tomato sauce

recipeInstructions.text: To make the tomato sauce, combine all ingredients for the sauce in a saucepan. Bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until slightly thickened. Use a stick blender to purée to your desired consistency.
Place naan breads onto baking trays. Spread each bread with 11/2 tbs sauce and scatter with 11/2 tbs pizza cheese. Top with salami, olives, mushroom and capsicum. Scatter over remaining pizza cheese.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden and bubbling, swapping trays halfway through cooking time. Slice pizzas in half and serve.
